attributes.action: Make Donald Trump uk Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: He will scale back on overseas aid, create jobs by bricking up the channel tunnel, and who knows, he may even sort out the pot hole problem in this country because the current and previous governments haven't bothered
attributes.background: In the 3 days he has been president, he has done more for his country than the uk government has done for Great Britain in the last 20 years. He's even going to have a 1000mile long wall built 10 years sooner than we can construct a mile long runway.

rejection.details:
In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
